MessageBuffer.h

00001 #ifndef MESSAGEBUFFER_H
00002 #define MESSAGEBUFFER_H
00003 
00004 #include <vector>
00005 #include "utils/global.h"
00006 #include "utils/Combiner.h"
00007 #include "utils/communication.h"
00008 #include "utils/vecs.h"
00009 using namespace std;
00010 
00011 template <class VertexT>
00012 class MessageBuffer {
00013 public:
00014     typedef typename VertexT::KeyType KeyT;
00015     typedef typename VertexT::MessageType MessageT;
00016     typedef typename VertexT::HashType HashT;
00017     typedef vector<MessageT> MessageContainerT;
00018     typedef hash_map<KeyT, int> Map; //int = position in v_msg_bufs //CHANGED FOR VADD
00019     typedef Vecs<KeyT, MessageT, HashT> VecsT;
00020     typedef typename VecsT::Vec Vec;
00021     typedef typename VecsT::VecGroup VecGroup;
00022     typedef typename Map::iterator MapIter;
00023 
00024     VecsT out_messages;
00025     Map in_messages;
00026     vector<VertexT*> to_add;
00027     vector<MessageContainerT> v_msg_bufs;
00028     HashT hash;
00029     void init(vector<VertexT*> vertexes)
00030     {
00031         v_msg_bufs.resize(vertexes.size());
00032         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00033             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00034             in_messages[v->id] = i; //CHANGED FOR VADD
00035         }
00036     }
00037     void reinit(vector<VertexT*> vertexes)
00038     {
00039         v_msg_bufs.resize(vertexes.size());
00040         in_messages.clear();
00041         for (int i = 0; i < vertexes.size(); i++) {
00042             VertexT* v = vertexes[i];
00043             in_messages[v->id] = i; //CHANGED FOR VADD
00044         }
00045     }
00046     void add_message(const KeyT& id, const MessageT& msg)
00047     {
00048 
00049         hasMsg(); //cannot end yet even every vertex halts
00050         out_messages.append(id, msg);
00051     }
00052 
00053     Map& get_messages()
00054     {
00055         return in_messages;
00056     }
00057 
00058     void combine()
00059     {
00060         //apply combiner
00061         Combiner<MessageT>* combiner = (Combiner<MessageT>*)get_combiner();
00062         if (combiner != NULL)
00063             out_messages.combine();
00064     }
00065 
00066     vector<VertexT*>& sync_messages()
00067     {
00068         int np = get_num_workers();
00069         int me = get_worker_id();
00070 
00071         //------------------------------------------------
00072         // get messages from remote
00073         vector<vector<VertexT*> > add_buf(_num_workers);
00074         //set send buffer
00075         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00076             VertexT* v = to_add[i];
00077             add_buf[hash(v->id)].push_back(v);
00078         }
00079         //================================================
00080         //exchange msgs
00081         //exchange vertices to add
00082         all_to_all_cat(out_messages.getBufs(), add_buf);
00083 
00084         //------------------------------------------------
00085         //delete sent vertices
00086         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00087             VertexT* v = to_add[i];
00088             if (hash(v->id) != _my_rank)
00089                 delete v;
00090         }
00091         to_add.clear();
00092         //collect new vertices to add
00093         for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00094             to_add.insert(to_add.end(), add_buf[i].begin(), add_buf[i].end());
00095         }
00096 
00097         //================================================
00098         //Change of G33
00099         int oldsize = v_msg_bufs.size();
00100         v_msg_bufs.resize(oldsize + to_add.size());
00101         for (int i = 0; i < to_add.size(); i++) {
00102             int pos = oldsize + i;
00103             in_messages[to_add[i]->id] = pos; //CHANGED FOR VADD
00104         }
00105 
00106         //================================================
00107         // gather all messages
00108         for (int i = 0; i < np; i++) {
00109             Vec& msgBuf = out_messages.getBuf(i);
00110             for (int i = 0; i < msgBuf.size(); i++) {
00111                 MapIter it = in_messages.find(msgBuf[i].key);
00112                 if (it != in_messages.end()) //filter out msgs to non-existent vertices
00113                     v_msg_bufs[it->second].push_back(msgBuf[i].msg); //CHANGED FOR VADD
00114             }
00115         }
00116         //clear out-msg-buf
00117         out_messages.clear();
00118 
00119         return to_add;
00120     }
00121 
00122     void add_vertex(VertexT* v)
00123     {
00124 
00125         hasMsg(); //cannot end yet even every vertex halts
00126         to_add.push_back(v);
00127     }
00128 
00129     long long get_total_msg()
00130     {
00131         return out_messages.get_total_msg();
00132     }
00133 
00134     int get_total_vadd()
00135     {
00136         return to_add.size();
00137     }
00138 
00139     vector<MessageContainerT>& get_v_msg_bufs()
00140     {
00141         return v_msg_bufs;
00142     }
00143 };
00144 
00145 #endif
